website_summaries.verdict: This corded model offers more power than cordless models, and the 9.3-foot pole gives it a longer reach than most pole saws.
pros: For users with frequent, large cutting jobs, this 6-amp model provides an impressive amount of cutting power
You never need to stop working to recharge because of the unit's corded power source
This model also offers an impressively long reach, and the head detaches from the pole to convert into a chain saw when that is the preferable tool
At 10.4 pounds, it is one of the lightest Greenworks models as well
cons: While the corded power provides some additional cutting power, it also limits the mobility of this model

website_summaries.verdict: A superb chainsaw that is designed to start quickly and can serve you well for years to come.
pros: Features a 6-amp motor that is proven to perform
Comes with a detachable extension handle for added convenience
Versatile chainsaw offers a wonderful choice for big and small projects alike
Easy to use time and time again

customer_reviews.title: Great tree trimmer
customer_reviews.text: For a woman who has never used a chain saw or pole saw this is perfect. Lighter in weight than some and is expandable. Will leak oil out of the reservoir if you don't set it upright, so be careful of that. Not really a big problem. Cleaning the chain and inner parts is easy, putting it back together and tightening the chain easy also. I trimmed all our trees about 20 with no problems. Was liberating to not have to call a professional and spend big bucks. I like the fact it came in a case for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Donna ❤

customer_reviews.title: Timber!
customer_reviews.text: This tiny chainsaw works fantastic! It cut through this Monterey pine with no problem. Make sure to cut small portions of the branch(es) to not let the weight of it snap where you are cutting so you do not injure the tree unless you do an “A” cut. Must purchase chainsaw oil to lubricate the blade.
customer_reviews.author: Nutritionist Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for pruning my trees!
customer_reviews.text: I have a bad back yet I was able to use this for simple pruning tasks around our garden. Within 15 minutes, I pruned a ragged crab apple tree. In 3 minutes, I coppiced (cut to ground) an overgrown purple smoke bush, some branches were nearly 3" diameter. I then pruned an old rose of sharon that was leaning into a path. This tool is balanced fairly well and is incredible sharp out of the box. I've read complaints that say the oil leaks when stored.... the instructions say to drain the oil before storing, which I will do. Overall, I've very happy... within a few hours I tamed my overgrown garden.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Finnsey

customer_reviews.title: Super Quiet
customer_reviews.text: I like the design and that the handle can be used without the middle section. If you compare the price with the local Home hardware store rental price of 50 per day this saw will pay for itself fast. Another thing that I like is that it’s Quiet not like the 2 stroke. Next nice thing is that it takes two minutes to set it up, or take a part and store it The down side is that you need an extension cord
customer_reviews.author: Marcel & Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Good saw, bad pole connectors
customer_reviews.text: I like the connector concept on this saw, but found that the way they attached the plastic parts that screw together to be a weak point. As I was using my pole saw today for the third time, the saw end pole disconnected from the rest of the pole. I found that the rivet that is supposed to hold the screw piece that interconnects the pole sections together had failed and the rivet had fallen out allowing the saw end to fall off the pole. I have not had any feedback yet on how GreenWorks is going to handle this issue and hope they will send a replacement pole section. Will update at a later date.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great tool plenty of power
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant in buying this since I'm old school and rely on my gas chain saw. I am getting a little older and I don't want to be on a ladder with a traditional chain saw. This pole saw has plenty of reach and has exceeded my expectation regarding power. anything less that 4 or 5 inches in diameter is no problem. It trims branches and takes down small trees. I can't vouch for the cordless ones but this is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!  Big improvement over my old Remington pole saw!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for a Remington pole saw that I had for a few years. The Remington was very heavy and never worked well. It was basically a detachable electric chainsaw mounted on the end of a pole. This dedicated pole saw is much lighter and easier to use. It seems longer but that just might be because it is so much easier to work with. Cuts through good size branches quickly. Only trick is the small oir reservoir. Could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: J W

customer_reviews.title: Per Greenworks, this item does NOT include the bag anylonger
customer_reviews.text: Saw performed flawlessly. I wish it included the shoulder strap. When I purchased my saw, the item listing says that it includes a soft case which mine was missing. I contacted Greenworks via their 1-888 number and the gentleman that answered told me that the saws no longer come with the case. He was however able to find a case in stock and said he would mail it to me. I am currently awaiting the case and will update if it does not show.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley VanMieghem

customer_reviews.title: Great tool but heavy powerhead
customer_reviews.text: The only drawback was that the powerhead is pretty heavy when the pole is completely extended. It cuts great. It's simple to adjust the length. The tote bag for it is a nice feature that the others don't offer. It is a bit on the smaller side as it has an 8 foot reach and others have 9-10. It has an 8 inch bar where others have 10. It costs a good bit less than the others and that's always a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: mark pipetTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: no case?
customer_reviews.text: I opened it up and put it together, no problem there. I probably won't try it until this weekend. Was it supposed to come with a storage case? Mine did not come with one. The item description on page 11 of the owners manual showed it includes one. I tried using the "Contact us" form but it returned "Unable to submit your request. Please, try again later".
customer_reviews.author: John in Michigan

customer_reviews.title: We love this little tool
customer_reviews.text: We love this little tool. We borrowed someone else's and after using it a few hours realized it was something we needed to own. I'd estimate that we did about $500 worth of tree limb trimming in a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen M.

customer_reviews.title: This thing is just great
customer_reviews.text: Took it out of the box put it together and oiled it up and started cutting, worked so well several of my friends tried it and have ordered them too. It's a little heavy but not unmanageable, and it really gets the work done cut more than 150 limbs in one day 3 of us working, all we did we keep it oiled (does use a lot) but that's it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: super easy to assemble and use
customer_reviews.text: Nice easy to use saw. Pole can be shortened by 1/3 for easier handling on lower branches. Perfect for trimming 3 and 4" branches. Adjustments like tightening the chain are super easy. Would have given 5 stars but owners manual said it came with a caring case and none in the box. Not a big deal, but paperwork should reflect the product.
customer_reviews.author: AJG

customer_reviews.title: Great for cutting coconuts and dead palm tree leaves that are on top of the palm trees.
customer_reviews.text: The speed by which this product was delivered to me. It was as described. I used it to cut down dead palm tree leaves, and coconuts (required by law as they are dangerous during hurricanes). It had an extension that can be assembled to allow cutting leaves and coconuts that are high on top of the palm trees.
customer_reviews.author: Yosh Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: OMG! Game Changer!
customer_reviews.text: We live in the desert and have queen palm trees (about 7). Some are by the pool. We need to occasionally cut the heavy pods out because we don't want the seeds, and this is amazing! We have also used it to help with our lemon tree, which has HUGE thorns on the branches. Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.author: Cold War Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Quality product and service
customer_reviews.text: This was a pleasant surprise. Well built tool, not flimsy tin and plastic. Worked great right out of the box with easy assembly. My pole saw did not have the storage bag in the box. One call to the number listed with the parts list and the bag was in the mail. Six days later the storage bag arrived and again it was a quality item. I have a Greenworks Electric trimmer that I have to struggle with the line feed on so I was apprehensive about the pole saw when I ordered it but as I said was pleasantly surprised with both the product and the quick, no fuss customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing will get it done!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical of buying a corded pole saw, but other than the obvious hassle of having cords strewn across the yard, I was extremely impressed with the work this saw did. I was hoping it would work well enough to take down a couple branches to make mowing easier, but it ended up taking down a whole pile....it was literally unbelievable how much power this saw has.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love the pole saw. It works perfectly on all my trees. I thought it would be hard to use but as a women I felt stronger using this product.
customer_reviews.author: helen julian

customer_reviews.title: so easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This pole chain saw is so easy to use, you just open the package, assemble the pole, put the chainsaw oil (it doesn't come with it) to the oil tank, and then good to go! It's powerful enough to cut 1~2" size branch like a butter. It's bit heavy but any coded pole saw weight is around 8 ~ 9lbs so I have to deal with it. You can take off the middle part of pole to shorten (little lighter) to use. The carry bag is nice bonus to store neatly.
customer_reviews.author: winnie

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for electric chainsaw
customer_reviews.text: A little heavy for me, but no problem for my husband. We've trimmed a lot of trees with it and it still runs great. The extension handle reaches quite far, or you can remove the handle and use it like a normal chainsaw.
customer_reviews.author: Texanabelle

customer_reviews.title: Limbing made easy---er.
customer_reviews.text: Was just using this today in fact! I cut down a large tree (no, I didn't use this on the trunk!) However when cutting branches to 'process' the tree, this thing worked great as I could reach over branches on the downed tree to cut other branches off from the stem...without having to climb over/move all of that debris first. It was delivered quickly, is plenty powerful enough...actually cuts better than I anticipated. It comes with a nice carry case for storage too!
customer_reviews.author: don S.

customer_reviews.title: Am I Happy?
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I purchased this product. The first one arrived in the included carrying bag. This one looked like open box item , parts tied together with plastic ties and no carrying bag. I think the item itself will be O.K. but I expected a new product not an open box one for a new item price. Very disappointing. Best regards, Frank F. Suchan
customer_reviews.author: F.Kamenak

customer_reviews.title: Very Good for the Price, No Real Drawbacks.
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good cutting performance given there is a cutter on only 1 link in 3 on the chain. Top heavy as others have noted but all pole trimmers are liable to that. Probably not the best for day in day out use - get a cherry picker and a gas chain saw for that! - but it's usable safely when 15 ft. up a ladder and that's not something I'd care to do with my gas chain saw. One strong point of this model that some competitors lack is an automatic chain oiler. Essential in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Mole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. So easy to use. AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE, STILL LOVE THIS SAW. It still works it's still awesome NO problems and I am cutting through trunks I shouldn't be. Best investment. If you are debating it just do it. I cut a whole tree down. Just left with the trunk. Wow. Soo easy to use. My new favorite toy. I have so many trees this thing comes in handy. Came in perfect condition. The price is good not much more I can ask for. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: KRIS Gaebelein

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, like it so far..
customer_reviews.text: The carry bag is good quality. its easy to assemble. used it 3 times and like the versatility of the 3 sections. only wish that the directions would have made it clearer on the adjustment of the chain and turn lock. but once we figured it out all was good. Also, I would suggest that anyone looking to be more green friendly... check out the US forestry on the type of oil to use. its supprised me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool.
customer_reviews.text: I already had an 18" chain saw, but needed one to trim limbs without climbing. This one does the trick, and does it well. I've also used it for really small jobs that I'd ordinarily use the other chain saw for, but didn't want to gas up, add chain lube, pull the starter cable, and all that. Instead, I strung out an extension cord, used this little saw, and got the job done. Obviously not for bigger jobs, but I've found it very useful. No problems of any kind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Female friendly pole saw
customer_reviews.text: As an older female, I found this pole saw to be a lot of fun to use. It's too heavy for me to manage with the extension, but without it I still have a 3 foot stretch. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Tiina

customer_reviews.title: Pole saw is front heavy, specially when the extension pole is attached.
customer_reviews.text: This is an initial review, as I haven't used the product due to the oil and extension cord I ordered haven't arrived. Will follow-up once I've used this product. Out of the box and after reading the manual, the Carry Storage Bag wasn't shipped with the pole saw. I've contacted Greenworks and am awaiting their response. This pole saw is front heavy, specially when the extension pole is attached. You'll need good upper-body and arm strength to use this product for long periods of time. My hope is that this saw works well and cuts fast.
customer_reviews.author: Island Dude

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: this has been a great tool for my garden and yard. Inexpensive, highly effective, nicely balanced. Now I'm wandering around my property, looking for things to chop down!
customer_reviews.author: shafman

customer_reviews.title: keep an eye on your chain oil.
customer_reviews.text: For the price I thought this would be a raggedy old theng. Geez it is great. Gotta know about the chain oil but any hardware store carrys it and you only have to fill it if you are using it hard. Does everything that my chainsaw does but is a lot lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good cutting tool
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect much from the tree trimmer. But when it came, the tool is light enough for me to use. The blade cuts through the branch easily. The fact that it can be bent to an angle makes cutting much easier. Just bend the blade, set it on top of the branch, and gravity does the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Binh Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: One Good. One Bad.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a second one of these after abusing the first one I bought. Definitely got my $60 worth on the first one and it worked great. Bought another and it broke immediately. I am sending it back for a replacement. I hope I get a good one. It seems that quality on these is hit or miss. I will update to a 4 star if the new one works as well as the first one I bought two years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Scott G

customer_reviews.title: Excellent item
customer_reviews.text: I've used this a few times since it arrived and it works very well and as I expected. I've had no problems at all. I've read reviews where people say it's heavy but considering it has many steel parts that you're holding 8' out on the end of a pole I don't consider heavy at at all. The pole is aluminum and light weight and the saw itself is a chainsaw made of steel with some plastic housing. I've had no problem using it to trim the palm and many branches off my oak and magnolia trees. If this lasted a few years and died I'd definitely buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An Awesome Tree Trimmer!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! Arrived in 2 days and works like a knife cutting butter! Easy to use and light weight! Takes the major work out of cutting off limbs and the case is great to keep in nice shape! Very pleased and would recommend for anyone that have trees that need to be shaped and trimmed! Scott
customer_reviews.author: scott payne

customer_reviews.title: Good value and quality. Easy to assemble and ise.
customer_reviews.text: Love it, great for small jobs. Only complaint is a bit top heavy when fully extended. Manufacturer should have included a pint of the oil that’s needed before operation. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: manny

customer_reviews.title: Remember to drain the bar oil after each use
customer_reviews.text: I like the efficiency of how it cuts. I use it to trim my trees in the front of the property. I have used it 4 times with no issues. Always remember to clean the saw after each use.
customer_reviews.author: John Gofney

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I bought my first house in Oct 2017 and had trees in desperate need of a trim. I think this has been a much better than having to pay someone to come trim them every time. It does ok with thicker branches but I'm not sure if I would take it to trunk of the tree. I like that it is versatile as far as length goes. It is a little heavy when it is all put together but manageable. It does seem to go through oil quickly so just keep an eye on it. I've gotten so much use out of it without issue so far!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Bosma

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Mighty Saw.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely Love this little pole saw. It is smaller than I thought and I was a little worried about its usefulness. BUT it is a mighty saw and got all the tree branches cut in no time. Even some pretty thick branches. The bag to keep it is wonderful and super practical with a long zipper to get all the parts in and out easily. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra

customer_reviews.title: Worked great the first few times.
customer_reviews.text: I've had it almost a year and it only worked its best the first 3 or 4 times since new. Bought a new chain and kept it oiled up. From the 10th time of use to now it just sprays oil everywhere and ends up running out of oil 5 minutes into use. Chain starts to spark and smoke at the point of cutting on my palm tree.
customer_reviews.author: Billy W.

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Efficient
customer_reviews.text: This saw exceeds my expectations, it is easy to assemble and very easy to use. It does exactly as advertised.success thru limbs with very little effort. Have to be very careful with it because it goes thru limbs so fast that they fall before toy know it. Great tool I highly recommend this too anyone that needs to do pruning and trimming
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Sanders

customer_reviews.title: No customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is heavy for working overhead but gets the job done. Unit came without a storage bag as advertised. Contacted customer service and never got a response.
customer_reviews.author: C. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: A great value
customer_reviews.text: My husband is so happy with this tool for trimming things up around out home. Says it cuts like butter!
customer_reviews.author: Mrskron

customer_reviews.title: Great Saw
customer_reviews.text: Cuts great, easy to handle and makes high limb trimming easy. Works better than gas and battery pack in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron S.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this!
customer_reviews.text: First the bristles never straightened out from being mashed by packaging. Leaks all over. When soap runs out it's hard to get the water out of the soap tank to put more soap in. It is heavy also. I would not by this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa L.

customer_reviews.title: This little saw works great make sure you get some bar oil so you ...
customer_reviews.text: This little saw works great make sure you get some bar oil so you can keep the chain lubed perfect for small limbs up high
customer_reviews.author: Scott Wear

customer_reviews.title: Go Greenworks!
customer_reviews.text: Love that I can handle it. Working on my muscle tone, though. lol! Once I learn how to sharpen the chain I will be set!! Great product and good price!!!
customer_reviews.author: C R Mack

customer_reviews.title: the motor burned up after first use
customer_reviews.text: I bought a lot of green woks products but this product did not stand up to regular use.
customer_reviews.author: Gilda Warren

customer_reviews.title: Greenworks Saw - Cuts like butter.
customer_reviews.text: I used this over the weekend. This Pole Saw is super easy. I was able to cut branches from 1/2" all the way to 9 inches in diameter. The apple tree went down in a snap. No more apples all over my yard. - Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette McD

customer_reviews.title: Didnt come with cover
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with no cover as advertised on the box and no small bottle of oil.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfie

customer_reviews.title: Package is damaged
customer_reviews.text: The saw is good, but it's a little bit heavy. And the package is damaged when I received the product.
customer_reviews.author: peng

customer_reviews.title: 5 star all the way
customer_reviews.text: Awesome saw i looked at about 15 different ones and decided on this one, weight is great not to heavy easy to assemble works perfect i have about 6 hours of cutting branches and small trees with it not one issue.
customer_reviews.author: E. ogara

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great Value, easy to use just hope it's a bit lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Kai H Mui

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong!
customer_reviews.text: Year 2 using this to clean up low limbs and it is still working great!
customer_reviews.author: Robert M

customer_reviews.title: Broke 1st time of light use.
customer_reviews.text: A screw came off the assembly and made contact with the chain. Broke most of the teeth on the chain. I filed a return.
customer_reviews.author: k24A8

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great
customer_reviews.text: Trimmed 6 piled sky high pickup loads of oak and pine branches with this so far and its done a great job with no issues at all. Amazing how high you can reach and its so light weight!
customer_reviews.author: B. Dickey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far the product works great. Took care of my tree trimming with ease
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Wonderful

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Cutting limbs 5+ inches with no difficulty. Storage bag is great and clean-up is easy. Have not found oil leaking any more than any other chain saw. Not as long as some but due to 8.6# weight it is probably just as well. It would be handy to have the saw itself disconnect from the pole to do the limb stripping for disposal.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Top heavy,not easy to hold on to
customer_reviews.text: Does not come with chain oil,had to go out to buy some.
customer_reviews.author: Andigo

customer_reviews.title: Great little saw
customer_reviews.text: Cut some lims works great.i think ever one needs on of these. Helps with getting your yard in good shape
customer_reviews.author: Debrahiggs

customer_reviews.title: Cut 2 minutes then replace the chain.
customer_reviews.text: Love that this pole saw came with a handy bag but the chain keep coming off. Every two minutes I'm having to stop to a just the bar and replace the chain. I can just be trimming rose bushes and the chain will pop off. At this point, I should have left it where it was!!!
customer_reviews.author: April Dean

customer_reviews.title: Both of my neighbors have borrowed this saw, and they are Men!
customer_reviews.text: i liked that this saw was relatively lightweight and cut everything i needed.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah M. Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Amazon out did it cell again!!!
customer_reviews.text: Was a great Buy and price them other places and saved way over $100
customer_reviews.author: Gerald W. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Cuts through branches very quickly
customer_reviews.text: It does an excellent job cutting branches and tree limbs. The end with the chainsaw (motor) gets a little heavy with the middle extension on, while placing it on the limb.
customer_reviews.author: JimL

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box this tool did just what was advertised & it did it well!
customer_reviews.author: Exceptionally Craptastic.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This works very well. Very easy to use. Cuts easily. Note, I used this about 10-15 minutes and had to refill the chain oiler. Also this is quite top heavy, and if you need to use just one hand to reach high branches it becomes very tiring quickly and be prepared to catch the pole as it drops after the cutting.
customer_reviews.author: Gary K. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!!
customer_reviews.text: It is an amazing saw , simple to use simple to put together, and more powerful then you would think, it cut the limbs off my live oaks with ease!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Goodbar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome.... Cut down a dozen little trees before noon.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic little saw I should have got this a long time ago!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle W.

customer_reviews.title: Impressive little chainsaw!
customer_reviews.text: Just needed to get through two pine trees at my new house so my solar would not be shaded. Took down a 25' pine followed by a 40-50' (over 16" base) pine tree. Worked great! My neighbors were blown away by this little guy!
customer_reviews.author: T. Crain

customer_reviews.title: Poor example of a pole saw.
customer_reviews.text: The saw blade comes loose very easily when working. a very poor way to make it tight. Makes working very difficult. This is my first pole saw and with this experience - my last.
customer_reviews.author: el viejo

customer_reviews.title: likes the price simplicty cuts good dislikes when on a ladder and have to reach ...
customer_reviews.text: likes the price simplicty cuts good dislikes when on a ladder and have to reach out horizantally saw is damm heavy give it 31/2to 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: steve mocker

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this about a month ago and have used it from trimming bushes to branches. Just make sure you put oil on the chain. The chain may come off when something is a bit thick, but it is very easy to put back on. I just love this pole cutter.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great Pole Saw
customer_reviews.text: Great Pole Saw,cordless would be better but if you don't mind using an extension Cord this is perfect for you.
customer_reviews.author: alex g

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this was a great price and it is very easy to use and cuts really fast and quick shipping
customer_reviews.author: T. Padgett

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great. I love it. It helps to trim branches from trees.
customer_reviews.author: Haris S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice cutting saw
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this once this summer. Performed flawlessly. No issues and just the right amount of length to cut through branches. I love that the unit comes apart, it makes the storage of the saw much easier. The storage option is a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny D

customer_reviews.title: Oiling system doesn't work good. Oil leaks and drips down the pole on ...
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. Oiling system doesn't work good. Oil leaks and drips down the pole on your hands. All oily surfaces catch the saw dust and motor is eventually got clogged up. You need to disassemble the unit or buy new again.
customer_reviews.author: Meyer Rotschild

customer_reviews.title: Works great and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong on this especially for personal yard work. Ensure you have adequate on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Heavy hitter.
customer_reviews.text: The pole saw works just as advertised. I did have to apply some slight pressure to larger tree limbs, but I could've been my angle, also. It is heavier than I thought it would be. The carry bag is an AWESOME amenity.
customer_reviews.author: Ro

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it's a great tool cuts branches fast
customer_reviews.text: It's a little heavy on the end which makes holding it up a bit hard. Otherwise it's a great tool cuts branches fast, and comes with a plastic cover, and a nice bag. Super easy to attach and detach the extension.
customer_reviews.author: LUCIAN M ALEXANDER

customer_reviews.title: Great pole saw value
customer_reviews.text: A great price, and works like it should. Easy to use. I don't have something to compare it to, so all I can say is that I really like this one.
customer_reviews.author: M. Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works good a little top heavy but you need the weight for cutting branches
customer_reviews.author: SKM

customer_reviews.title: Great little saw for small jobs
customer_reviews.text: The saw worked well, and is very convenient to shorten and lengthen. Cord management is made simple with the ‘Cord lock’ in the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Works wells for occassional trim jobs - good value.
customer_reviews.text: We've used it a few times now, and I am satisfied that it works as described. I do follow other reviewers recommendations and drain the bar oil back into the container when done.
customer_reviews.author: DanJSX

customer_reviews.title: greenworks saw
customer_reviews.text: work,s like a little horse,just love it. very simple to use highly recomended.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne M.

customer_reviews.title: Storage case did not come with it
customer_reviews.text: The item was supposed to come with a case to store it in but said case was not in the box
customer_reviews.author: Russell jenks

customer_reviews.title: If you have one tree you need to trim this will work fine, if you are going to use it multiple ...
customer_reviews.text: This saw is just cheaply made and not very durable. If you have one tree you need to trim this will work fine, if you are going to use it multiple times, I would suck it up and buy a more expensive one.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Royster

customer_reviews.title: Head heavy and it is not safe to  use
customer_reviews.text: it is a good idea but the top is too heavy to use as a pruning saw.
customer_reviews.author: JAY

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product that gives excellent results.
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality piece of equipment. It is balanced well an easy to use and handle. We are actually using it to cut down small tries at their base as we can not bend over like we used too - too old.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Sechrest

customer_reviews.title: Missing Carry Bag
customer_reviews.text: Emailed them twice about missing carry bag. It has been 2 weeks with no response. I will return entire unit this friday if no contact by Greenworks. Great saw but should come with all items listed on box.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: I like it. I onlynuse it once and fast
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I onlynuse it once and fast, bc it cut thru the branch so fast. One thing not good is the package or manual I didn't find I need the bar and chain oil b4 using the saw.
customer_reviews.author: flyfly

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very mad. I was looking forward to the carrying case which did not come with the order.
customer_reviews.author: MARTEENA D. Beulah

customer_reviews.title: good price, works well.
customer_reviews.text: made short work of some trees blocking the view from my deck. Saved a lot of money versus the tree service!
customer_reviews.author: Q. McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Yes! We didn't need to call someone out to ...
customer_reviews.text: Yes! We didn't need to call someone out to trim our tree that was too near the roof for our insurance company.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: Chainsaw in a stick👍
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Using a chainsaw is much less intimidating when there is a six foot distance. It cuts through 1 1/2 inch thick branches with ease.
customer_reviews.author: cfn

customer_reviews.title: Update used the trimmer only complaint is the chain keeps ...
customer_reviews.text: Update used the trimmer only complaint is the chain keeps getting loose and u have to keep an eye on the oil runs out quickly. Cuts well.
customer_reviews.author: James Doran

customer_reviews.title: Good saw for light work.
customer_reviews.text: Did my trimming on over a dozen trees in less than an hour. It took me longer to pick up the branches than it did to cut them.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Logan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made but did what I needed it to do.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came at the perfect time after Irma and got tons of use works amazing and very handy!
customer_reviews.author: Cody A Wallace

customer_reviews.title: convertible
customer_reviews.text: Little thing kicks butt. Like that the pole is ready to attach and remove
customer_reviews.author: Greg Phillips

Leading in innovation, the corded lawn system offers a variety of tools to get all your yd. work done quickly & efficiently. Whether you need something economical or with greater performance, the Greenworks corded lawn tools provide reliable options without the hassle of gas or the high cost of operation throughout the years. Get started within s & leave the gas hassle behind. Choose from trimmers, Chainsaws, mowers, snow throwers, dethatchers, pressure washers & more
